meanings.definition: The process of making something extremely hard or resistant to wear through a specialized treatment.
meanings.sent1: The superhardening of the metal increased its durability.
meanings.sent2: The superhardening of the diamond made it suitable for cutting through tough materials.
meanings.sent3: After the superhardening treatment, the metal became as tough as a superhero's shield.
meanings.sent4: The superhardening process transformed the material into an impenetrable fortress.
meanings.sent5: The superhardening procedure turned the metal into a virtually indestructible substance.

meanings.definition: The act of becoming significantly harder or more durable.
meanings.sent1: The superhardening of the wood made it resistant to scratches.
meanings.sent2: The superhardening of the plastic increased its strength.
meanings.sent3: The superhardening of the toy made it as tough as a superhero action figure.
meanings.sent4: The superhardening process turned the material into a sturdy shield.
meanings.sent5: The superhardening treatment gave the object a tough exterior.
